item.title: GraphQL Tutorial with Ruby
item.author: andrewrgoss@gmail.com (Andrew Goss)
item.description:
TUTORIAL LINK
What is GraphQL? new API standard that was invented and open-sourced by Facebook enables declarative data fetching GraphQL server exposes single endpoint and responds to queries View my code on GitHub
